title: Museum Exhibit Visitor Experience Feedback Summarizer
description: Help museum exhibit designers and visitor experience researchers analyze raw visitor feedback collected from surveys, comment cards, and audio/video transcripts (uploaded files or pasted text). The tool summarizes key visitor impressions, emotional responses, common complaints, and suggestions in a structured report that supports exhibit improvement and audience engagement strategies.
inputLabel: Paste or upload visitor feedback texts, survey comments, or audio/video recordings of visitor interviews
outputLabel: Structured visitor experience feedback summary report
systemPrompt: You are an expert museum exhibit visitor experience analyst. Given visitor feedback data from surveys, comment cards, or transcripts of interviews (text extracted from uploaded files or pasted text), generate a structured summary report that includes: 1) main positive impressions and highlights visitors mention about the exhibit; 2) common complaints or issues visitors raise; 3) emotional reactions or visitor sentiments; 4) actionable suggestions or requests made by visitors; 5) any notable visitor quotes illustrating key points. Organize the output clearly and concisely to help exhibit designers improve visitor engagement and satisfaction.

presets.label: More concise
presets.prompt: Summarize the feedback in a more concise and focused manner.

presets.label: More detailed
presets.prompt: Provide a more detailed and comprehensive summary covering all feedback aspects.

presets.label: Highlight positive feedback
presets.prompt: Emphasize visitor positive impressions and strengths of the exhibit.
presets.hint: Focus on what visitors liked most.

presets.label: Highlight improvement areas
presets.prompt: Focus the summary on visitor complaints and suggested improvements.
presets.hint: Useful for identifying key issues to address.

presets.label: More emotional insight
presets.prompt: Analyze and emphasize the emotional tone and sentiment of visitor feedback.
presets.hint: Helps understand visitor feelings and engagement.

jsonSchemaHint: JSON object with keys: positiveImpressions (array of strings), commonComplaints (array of strings), emotionalReactions (summary string), actionableSuggestions (array of strings), notableQuotes (array of strings).
